info.title: tchop app
info.description:
### API - General Info

[Learn more of the tchop principle (structure of mixes and cards)](https://tchop.io/principle).

The list below contains internal TCHOP API routes that are used by internal components.
External API routes are mapped to internal routes by Nginx load balancer by extracting organization and channel name and prepending them to URL path.

- `/api/some-path` -> https://tchop.io/api/some-path

- `/organisation/api/some-path` -> https://[organisation].tchop.io/api/some-path

- `/channel/api/some-path` -> https://[channel]-[organisation].tchop.io/api/some-path

API versioning is supported:

Mask: `/api/[version]/some-path`

- `/api/v1/some-path`
- `/api/v2/some-path`


### Mobile API

Route: `/api/v3`

Mobile routers are have their own authorization system. In order to retrieve authentication token call `/api/v3/login`,
then use token in `x-tchop-token` header.

Mobile routers are of the following types:

- `user` - User management and session controlling

- `channel` - Get channels list and channel info

- `extension` - Parsing images, articles and social posts (twitter, facebook, instagram)

- `chats` - Chat management

### Output Stream API

Route: `/api/stream/v1`

Output Stream API allows you to deliver content of your channel to different platforms in a simple way.

In order to use Output Stream API you must have a valid token.
It can be created on the developer page of your channel ([My Profile](https://tchop.io/me) -> Channel -> Developers)

API key belongs to the channel/organisation and has no expiration date.

\* There's also a deprecated route that doesn't support pagination: `/channel/api/v3/mixes`

get.summary: Get available mixes by assigned connection

post.summary: Creates new mix. Only dashboard or same type of integration can update/delete this mix

put.summary: Updates mix. Only dashboard or same type of integration can update this mix

post.summary: Save item in the current mix by raw data
Parse and save item in the current mix by URL

Returns a list of channel mixes with pre-fetching their contents
Returns a story content with support pagination
Returns valid pubnub keys and auth token, refreshes tokens and access if needed

List of user IDs to add

bannedUsers.description: List of users IDs. Disables sending add-service-message about users with these IDs.

self.description: If true: will add user to public chat

users.description: To change users self should contain only one item with current user ID

chatHidden.description: It is only allowed to change self chatHidden property

access.description: It is only allowed to change other members access (if current user has chat admin access)

users.description: List of user IDs to remove

self.description: If true: will remove user from chat

UserInstanceIdHeader.name: x-tchop-firebase-instance-id
UserInstanceIdHeader.description: Firebase Instance ID provides a unique identifier for each app instance and a mechanism to authenticate and authorize actions (example: sending FCM messages)
